title: Can we have a report premade feature please.
body: Can we have a feature to report pre made offensive teammates. All i'm getting is 4 man team pre mades and i'm sick as shit of it. They refuse to mia, ping of any kind, you don't get any ganks, and when you ask for it they all tell you to fuck yourself. Can we please get a report pre made team feature. I don't fucking even want to be with or against a 4 or 5 pre made team. That's why i'm fucking solo queueing. I mean how many games do you guys expect me to keep my cool with these fucking pre mades. And when i get to fucking raging and get in trouble I'm to blame. I'm a fucking person too, how long do you expect me to deal with these shit situations happening every game basically.

replies.body:
Your attitude is great evidence as to why a group of premade players wants nothing to do with you.
Maybe realize you are the problem, shape up, stop blaming them, and people will be more inclined to help you.

I had a problem along the lines of this today, all for one, we were winning pretty well then at some point past 20 min mark pre-made decides to ff we lose. I can report them but it really won't make a difference, it just sucks. Sorry needed to vent about it.

> [{quoted}](name=MewtwoRisen,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=xqgXr8IK,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-09T02:50:39.618+0000)
>
> They refuse to mia, ping of any kind, you don&#039;t get any ganks, and when you ask for it they all tell you to fuck yourself.

You really shouldn't be blaming your lack of map awareness on them.

Same with the ability to set up / prep for ganks.
